description:
Pixel Tennis Player Madness Free Game

This game is awesome! Control the tennis player to collect as many tennis balls as possible. 3 levels of difficulty. Simple controls and addictive gameplay. Get the highest score and share it on Twitter and Facebook with your friends. Awesome pixelated graphics.

Download now.
